plot: Maudits is a futuristic Faustian tale of humanoids torn between freedom and security when a false Messiah leads them on a disastrous journey.
title: Maudits
plot_es: Maudits is a futuristic Faustian tale of humanoids torn between freedom and security when a false Messiah leads them on a disastrous journey.
plot_en: Maudits is a futuristic Faustian tale of humanoids torn between freedom and security when a false Messiah leads them on a disastrous journey.
